item.title: blognation Ireland Launches
item.description: I’m still buzzing over the fact that the blognation Ireland site has gone live. We’ve already made it to the front page of Techmeme! As I said in the opening post: The Irish site is part of the blognation network which is building up to be the biggest tech news site on non-US Web 2.0 startups around the globe including EMEA, Asia-Pacific, Latin America and Canada Feel free to send me any news about your web or mobile application, no matter how early stage you are.
